title: Godrej 190 L Direct Cool Single Door 4 Star Refrigerator with Intelligent Inverter Compressor  (Sleek Steel, RD 1904 PTI 43 SI ST)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: 20 L Large Vegetable Basket, 2.5 L Aqua Space in Door shelf, Suitable for Families with 2-3 Members
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Godrej
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Refrigerator Comes with a 10 Years Warranty On Compressor and 1 Year Warranty On All Other Parts (Except Bulb, Glass and Add On Plastic Parts) From the Date of Purchase, Against Defective Material and Good Workmanship. In the Warranty Period Beyond the First Year of Purchase, Only the Compressor Will Be Provided Free of Cost. However , the Appliance Will Be Repaired on Payment of Necessary Charges
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: In case, the Appliance or Any Part is Subjected to Neglect, Abuse or Misuse, Tampering, Alteration or Any Other Acts of God, or Damage by Rodents and Insects. Warranty Automatically Expires After the Stipulated Period of Original Purchase Even if the Refrigerator was Not in Use for Anytime for Whatsoever Reasons. Warranty Does Not Cover or is Not Applicable in case of Original Number (Serial no., sticker) is Removed Obliterated or Altered from the Product. The Company is Not Responsible for Any Damage Caused to the Appliances and Shall Not be Liable for Any Consequential Loss or Compensation Nor Refund of Purchase Price or Replacement.

product_description.Sophisticated Inverter Technology: Integrated with modern inverter technology, the Godrej 190 L Single-door Refrigerator's variable speed compressor smartly controls its operations. This helps ensure efficient, enduring, and low-noise performance.
product_description.Large Vegetable Tray: Boasting a large vegetable tray, this fridge offers ample storage space for fruits and vegetables.

review:
Performance perfectly excellent. For Indian weather and environmental conditions this is the Best available refrigerator on Earth. Other good brands can perform in the countries of their origin and not in India. I tried many brands since 1975. Godrej is the Best for Indian conditions. Hail Godrej.
Dr.P.Venkataramana, Professor of Management.
Awesome product good design brand furnish spacious from Godrej must got this one. My family loved it. fast delivery by Flipkart
Its simply look "WOWWWW" and "AN AMAZING INDIAN BRAND". Thank you flipkart for nice offer and timely delivery even in such pandemic situation.
Very good model inverter fridge best power save 196 capacity very very very good Godrej company is best

Reviewing after a months use.
Overall its a good product at its price range. Ideal for 2 to 3 person house.
This has a good space which stores most of the needful items if stuffed properly.
Cooling has been really good with the machine, no over cooling yet. So saves unnecessary defrost efforts.
The vegetable rack is also large, one can easily store a weeks veggies comfortably.

Trusted Indian Brand Go for it.
Design & Performance is Excellent.
BEE Rating 5Stars
Best price - 12499* in Bigg Billion Day
Excellent Delevery , Thanks To Flipkart for this Awsome product.

I am really unhappy with the product... It is not even a month... So soon the compressor stopped working... PCB motherboard has some issue... And from 1 week refrigerator is idle... I am extremely unhappy with the wrong decision 😞...

Iam received August 7 today August 13 now iam giving to feed back,
In this price 13500 very good product iam satisfied and delivery boy also very good.

Product sold via online/flipkart are rejected products. Please don't buy these items online/ via flipkart. Initially freezer stopped working, I contacted godrej team, they sent their personnel within a day. That personnel asked to place a return request as it has not even been 15 days since receiving the order. Later I contacted flipkart regarding the same matter and they said, matter will be resolved before 1st September. Now, its 1st September, refrigerator completely stopped working since 31st Aug, spoiling my complete food inside. I had never experienced such pathetic product experience from flipkart. As for godrej, this kind of product experience completely drowns the company's name. I would think twice before purchasing any godrej product.
Suitable for one person or max 2. The inner material of the fridge door is bit light. Care needed to be taken while removing things from the door.
